ivardefs.name: current
ivardefs.desc: The FHIR query based rules are applied to the current resource state.

ivardefs.name: previous
ivardefs.desc: The FHIR query based rules are applied to the previous resource state.

ivardefs.name: requireBoth
ivardefs.desc: If set to true, both current and previous criteria must evaluate true to  trigger a notification for this topic.  Otherwise a notification for this topic will be triggered if either one evaluates to true.

properties.desc: The FHIR query based rules that the server should use to determine when to trigger a notification for this topic.
